values: So. Who's going to tell me what's going on? 8D; [ Um. Mommy? Did something...kinda sorta just a little bit...happen last night? Because. Seto doesn't look good, and you're not home, and I called and checked with Yuugi's grandpa and Seto told me not to do that and I wanted to send some of our guys out to find you but Seto said not to do it and he hasn't gotten like this in a long time but I reallly don't think this is good so if someone could please make this make sense for me, that would be cool? :X ] Edit: Oh yeah! XD! I completely forgot to tell you all I was coming back. *death* I should probably have done that, huh? Yeah, I flew back last night. I got here like three in the morning. And Seto was still awake because he's a zombie like that. Or a vampire~! =[ One day, we're going to come home to find Yami all mauled and covered in blood, and Seto with have these big pointy fangs, and then they'll turn me into a vampire too, and we can go flying all over the place. Cool, huh? XD Edit2: [ YAMI MADE HIM CRY. AND NOW I CAN'T FIND HIM. ]

I couldn't find a lot of pictures, but I did manage to find some. Hope they were what you were looking for. I arranged them chronologically, and my hand's in some of them, because I didn't feel like finding a scanner. XD And. I know this is for Yami and stuff, but I thought you might like to see them too, Noa. And please don't show them to Seto, because I don't want him to...nevermind. These are the ones from when we were really little, and then at the orphanage. I think I'm five or so, in these, which makes Nii-sama ten.
Seto smiled a lot when he was little. :D And here's some pictures I got from a tourist. I guess orphanages are like a big attraction now? And here we are playing chess! And a snapshot of Seto, but I'm in it too -- see?
Then Gozaburo came. He had lots of people to take pictures of him when he donated money to the orphanage, and that's where I got these pictures.
I was kinda scared, but Nii-sama was really brave! Here he is winning the game.
That was how we got adopted, of course. And. Now pictures from when we moved to the mansion. Some of them are captures from the security tapes, or the ones that didn't get destroyed, at least. I took some of them, too! :D
That was when we first got there. I was kinda scared again. ^_^;; And here's some I took of Seto studying. He studied a lot. =| Then our adoptive father came in, and Seto wasn't happy. =/ Actually, Seto wasn't happy a lot, while Gozaburo was around. >_> Er. Sorry. You probably wanted less...yeah. He also worked really hard. So he was kinda...tired a lot of the time. But some things still made him smile. :D
A bit later, of course, Gozaburo and Nii-sama played another "game." But you know about that already. Here's some pictures of while that was going on.
And obviously, Nii-sama won. :D And. Then...some time went by. But that's over now, and everything's better. :D This one's my favorite!
There we go. Happy early birthday, Yami! XD

[I just made Noa want to kill himself. I'm the worst little brother in the world. But. Maybe I can fix some of it if I come home immediately? And he'll forgive me then? I wish Nii-sama were here. And I don't want to leave without what he came here for. But if Noa's going to kill himself -- Gah. Why do I suck at this?!] Turns out I'm coming back from Egypt ahead of time! Cool, huh? Yeah, I know, you guys all missed me insanely; don't worry! I'll be back in Domino (and back in action!) as soon as I can.

Yami and Seto are probably back in Domino now. Don't know when they'll be home.

So.

Er.

How are you?

<s>Why've you been so odd about Seto lately,</s><small> <s>anddoesithaveanythingtodowiththefactthatyouvebeenwatchinghimandYami...<sub>screwing</sub></s></small>?

At long last, the rare and mysterious Yami has been photographed, providing once and for all solid, scientific evidence that
YAMI IS GIRLY
like nothing else around. I would add captions, but -- you know, I really think the picture speaks for itself!
And because he's Nii-sama's Twu Luv~ <333333 !! and it's bad form to kill your boyfriend's adorable kid brother, he's NOT going to tickle me to death for posting that!

Hey, guys! Guess who's going on a vacation, courtesy of the best Nii-sama around! Yeah, that's right! The next time you hear from me, I'll be in Thebes. ...Of course, currently, I'm a few hundred feet above Thebes. Who knew you could update LJ from the cockpit, huh? [Hands off my Nii-sama, kthnx.] [I hope you've got a tight hold on your air sick bags! Plane's coming down in...ten seconds! Wanna see if it can do water landings?!] [I know you're coming back and all, and soon, but I figured you wouldn't mind a visit, right? See you tomorrow I hope!] [Sorry about leaving you all alone and all, but don't worry! We're going to be back soon. We'll just find Seto, and bring him home -- and that shouldn't take more than a few hours now that we're in Egypt, right?] Right, it's hard to play Counterstrike land a plane and comment at the same time, so if I'm quiet, it's because I'm slaughtering the other team Yami's wailing at the top of his lungs and clinging to the seatback for dear life! He really doesn't fly well. Bye!
